docs.snippet: Facebook and Twitter don’t make it easy to run your old posts through the scrubber. So our personal tech columnist took on the challenge.

headline.print_headline: Scrubbing Timeline Can Be a Chafing Experience
headline.main: Want to Purge Your Social Media Timelines? Can You Spare a Few Hours?

docs.snippet: Alex Stamos, Facebook’s chief information security officer, who plans to leave the company by August, is known in Silicon Valley for his strong stands.

docs.snippet: Fed policymakers conclude their March rate-setting meeting on Wednesday. It is the first such session with Jerome H. Powell as the central bank’s new chairman.

headline.main: What to Expect From Powell’s First Fed Meeting: DealBook Briefing

docs.snippet: Stocks on Wall Street surged on signs of easing trade tensions.

docs.snippet: Mark Zuckerberg, Facebook’s chief executive, has agreed to testify in Washington over how his social network handled people’s data, according to people familiar with the decision.

headline.print_headline: Zuckerberg Makes Date For Live Chat With Congress
headline.main: Facebook’s Zuckerberg Said to Agree to Testify Before Congress Over Data Privacy

docs.snippet: Mr. Musk deleted the Facebook pages of two of his companies, SpaceX and Tesla. He and the Facebook C.E.O., Mark Zuckerberg, have, er, not always gotten along.
